author: dandiep
msg: - Start of a JaxWsServiceFactoryBean for the server side of the
JAX-WS hello world. The bean uses the WSDLServiceFactory in
conjunction with the jax ws annotations to build up a Service.
Endpoint.publish should be able to use this to help publish a
Service. Additionally its nicely reusable for people not wanting
to use the nasty Endpoint.publish() method. Still needs work
- removed the JAX-WS dependency from the SOAP binding.
We were throwing a WebServiceException. I changed this to a
RuntimeException for now, but we really need a FaultException
which contains things like the fault code.
- Changed checkstyle back to allow ifs without brackets. I really
don't feel like this rule is representative of code quality and I
don't feel its worth the time to go and change my code.
